name: Q19
description:
Q19 Prototype

STATE: VERY ROUGH

A short proof of concept of an idea I've wanted to try for a few years. These are the key points of the idea:

  • Movement inspired by Perfect Stride and racing games with a focus on continually moving forward and never stopping.
  • Blasting enemies at high speed
  • Looping through a level to really nail that perfect run

I feel like this prototype proves that the combination works.

What do you think?

Controls

Look . . . . . . . . . . . . Mouse
Space . . . . . . . . . . . Boost
Fire . . . . . . . . . . . . . Left Mouse Button

Music on/off . . . . . M
Quit . . . . . . . . . . . . . Escape

Temporary ingame music by Danger

Post your best time in the comments!
